script.name: plugin.guilds.mission
script.sourceplaintext:
$guilds.data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' skip if $guilds.data return null
if $a.guild == 'beryll' if $a.mission == 1 $pos = $a.value -> get position as array $guilds.data['soi.toa.pos'] = $pos $rot = $a.value -> get rot alpha $guilds.data['soi.toa.rota'] = $rot $rot = $a.value -> get rot beta $guilds.data['soi.toa.rotb'] = $rot $rot = $a.value -> get rot gamma $guilds.data['soi.toa.rotg'] = $rot $dest = $a.value -> get gate destination: return sector=[FALSE] $guilds.data['soi.toa2'] = $dest $pos = $a.value -> get position as array $guilds.data['soi.toa2.pos'] = $pos $rot = $a.value -> get rot alpha $guilds.data['soi.toa2.rota'] = $rot $rot = $a.value -> get rot beta $guilds.data['soi.toa2.rotb'] = $rot $rot = $a.value -> get rot gamma $guilds.data['soi.toa2.rotg'] = $rot $a.value ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] else if $a.mission == 2 unlock achievement: id=$a.value end end
$tGuild = $guilds.data[$a.guild] skip if $tGuild return null
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
if $a.guild == 'bounty' if $a.mission == 1 $tHQ = $tGuild['shipyard'] $tHQ['sector'] = $a.value $tHQ = $tGuild['hq'] $station = $tHQ['obj'] $tHQ['sector'] = $a.value $tHQ['type'] = The Apex Pursuit Hub $tHQ['nameid'] = 89380 gosub sub.DestroyStation @ $new.hq = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.buildhq : Guild=$a.guild Data=$tHQ Is HQ?=[TRUE] if not $a.startup if $new.hq -> is in same sector as [PLAYERSHIP] $new.hq ->play station building cutscene: build ship=[PLAYERSHIP] end end
$sector = $new.hq -> get sector
$player.name = get player name $read.text = sprintf: pageid=[Page.Sectors] textid=14000, $player.name, null, null, null, null $sector ->set override description: $read.text $sector ->set owner race to Guilds $name = $tGuild['name'] if $name $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=$name $sector ->set sector override race name: $read.text end $sector ->set capital sector: [TRUE] if not $a.startup unlock achievement: id='bounty.guild.1' end activate job: id=10304 activate job: id=10305 activate job: id=10306 activate job: id=10307 activate job: id=10308
else if $a.mission == 2 $tHQ = $tGuild['shipyard'] $tHQ['nobuild'] = [FALSE] $tHQ['sector'] = $a.value @ $new.hq = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.buildhq : Guild=$a.guild Data=$tHQ Is HQ?=[FALSE] if not $a.startup if $new.hq -> is in same sector as [PLAYERSHIP] $new.hq ->play station building cutscene: build ship=[PLAYERSHIP] end unlock achievement: id='bounty.guild.2' end end
else if $a.guild == 'assassin' if $a.mission == 1 $sector = $a.value if not $a.startup $contested = $guilds.data['contested.sectors'] remove key $sector from table $contested end
$sector ->set owner race to Guilds $name = $tGuild['name'] if $name $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=$name $sector ->set sector override race name: $read.text end $sector ->set sector text id: 15052 $sector ->set sector description id: 15052 $sector ->set capital sector: [TRUE] if not $a.startup unlock achievement: id='assassin.guild.1' end
$tHQ = $tGuild['hq'] $station = $tHQ['obj'] $tHQ['sector'] = $a.value $tHQ['race'] = Privateer if $station -> exists $beacon = create ship: type=Jump Beacon owner=Guilds addto=$a.value x=-16000 y=2500 z=31000 $flags = [JumpFlg.Quick] | [JumpFlg.NoDeviceCheck] | [JumpFlg.NoEnergyCheck] | [JumpFlg.NoJumpableCheck] = $station ->jump: object=$beacon flags=$flags $beacon ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $station ->set owner race to Privateer if $station -> is of class Ship @ = $station -> call script lib.cycrow.createspeaker : Race=Paranid end end activate job: id=10350 activate job: id=10351 activate job: id=10352 activate job: id=10353 activate job: id=10354 activate job: id=10355 end else if $a.guild == 'merc' if $a.mission == 'escort.success' $escort.data = $a.value -> get local variable: name='merc.escort' $xp = $escort.data[5] @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.doexp : Exp=$xp Guild=$a.guild Delay=2000 $a.value ->set local variable: name='merc.escort' value=null remove key 'escort' from table $guilds.data else if $a.mission == 'escort.fail' do if $a.value -> exists $a.value ->set local variable: name='merc.escort' value=null remove key 'escort' from table $guilds.data end end
return null
sub.DestroyStation: if $station -> exists $ships = $station ->get ship table from sector/ship/station if $ships $key = get next key: table=$ships key=null while $key $owner = $key -> get owner race do if $owner == Player @ START $key -> call script !move.undock : $key = get next key: table=$ships key=$key end end @ = wait 1000 ms $station ->remove event script: script=plugin.guilds.hq.event $station ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end endsub return null

line.text: play station building cutscene: build ship=
play station building cutscene: build ship=
